Notes: A non-playable variant of Luigi that can be talked to. LuigiIntrusively allows the player to play as Luigi when talked to in a galaxy. Due to its complexity, its individual message flow functions are explained on the Luma's Workshop wiki.

Obj_arg0.Name: Disable After Luigi Unlocked?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set and Luigi starts appearing in other galaxies, this object won't appear anymore, no matter what.

Obj_arg7.Name: Special Talk Camera?
Obj_arg7.Description: If set, it will use the camera with the name 独自会話 when talked to.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_B.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Camera.Description: Only used when Obj_arg7 is set. The camera used for talking to him goes by the label 独自会話.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: This object can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.

Message.Description: The text message ID to be used. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file. LuigiIntrusively will always load the text with the label LuigiIntrusively000.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and licked by Yoshi.
